Name: dv-scalebar
Version: 0.1.1

===

dv-scalebar - Javascript library for scalebar components

BSD 3-Clause License

Copyright (c) 2024, Stefan Keim

modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:

Some dv-scalebar builds include 3rd-party dependencies.
A complete license files for each build can be found here:
https://github.com/indus/dv-scalebar/dist
